alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued May 12 at 3:01PM AKDT until May 13 at 8:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as around 30 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Yakutat, Haines upper Chilkat Valley, Gustavus, Hoonah, Pelican, and Juneau Borough. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 AM AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For the Juneau area, confidence is highest for the Mendenhall Valley area.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect vulnerable plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area
